Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near Root/Princeton
ShortDescription: WB 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Wallace & Root, due to street blockage near Root/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Wallace and Root, due to street blockage near Root/Princeton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at 67th/Cornell
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 67th/Cornell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, Marquette, Jeffrey, 67th, and resume normal route due to street blockage near 67th/Cornell.

Allow extra travel time.
